name: ThingSmartBeaconKit
prefix_header_contents:
#ifdef __OBJC__
   #import <YYModel/YYModel.h>
   #import <ThingSmartUtil/ThingSmartUtil.h>
   #ifndef TYBLogMacro
       #define TYBLogMacro
       #define ThingBLogDebug(...)         ThingSDKLog(0, @"ThingSmartBeaconKit", __FILE__, __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, __LINE__, ##__VA_ARGS__)
       #define ThingBLogInfo(...)         ThingSDKLog(1, @"ThingSmartBeaconKit", __FILE__, __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, __LINE__, ##__VA_ARGS__)
       #define ThingBLogWarn(...)         ThingSDKLog(2, @"ThingSmartBeaconKit", __FILE__, __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, __LINE__, ##__VA_ARGS__)
       #define ThingBLogError(...)         ThingSDKLog(3, @"ThingSmartBeaconKit", __FILE__, __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, __LINE__, ##__VA_ARGS__)
   #endif
#endif
